scenario_text.value:
Miyuki and Haru are kind of strange, aren’t
they?

Yeah. They’re smaller than the rest of you.
Human children come in all shapes and sizes!

Oh, so that’s what you meant. No, they’re
just younger than we are.

Younger? Does that make them even more
special than you?

Huh? What makes you say that? Anyway, they’ll
be a lot bigger by the time they’re adults.
Oh, so you don’t stay children forever.
Right. Man, I hope we live to be adults.
Are we not going to talk to Haru and Miyuki?
